Package space.sunqian.fs.object.convert

Interface DataMapper.SchemaCache

Enclosing interface:
DataMapper
public static interface DataMapper.SchemaCache
Cache for DataSchemas parsed during the mapping process.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    @Nonnull DataSchema
    get(@Nonnull Type type, @Nonnull Function<? super @Nonnull Type,? extends @Nonnull DataSchema> loader)
    Returns the DataSchema for the given type.

  • Method Details

    • get

      @Nonnull @Nonnull DataSchema get(@Nonnull @Nonnull Type type, @Nonnull @Nonnull Function<? super @Nonnull Type,? extends @Nonnull DataSchema> loader) throws ObjectConvertException
      Returns the DataSchema for the given type. If the schema is not cached, it will be loaded by the given loader. The semantics of this method are the same as Map.computeIfAbsent(Object, Function).
      Parameters:
      type - the given type to be parsed to DataSchema
      loader - the loader for loading new DataSchema
      Returns:
      the DataSchema for the given type
      Throws:
      ObjectConvertException - if an error occurs during parsing
